articles.title: Hong Kong: 11kg suspected cocaine found in motorised wheelchair - BBC
articles.description: A 51-year-old man could face life in prison after the discovery by Hong Kong airport officials.
articles.content:
Officials at Hong Kong International Airport have uncovered 11kg of suspected cocaine hidden in the cushions of an electric wheelchair. 
The haul, worth an estimated $1.5m (£1.26m), was found when a… [+1524 chars]

articles.author: Donato Paolo Mancini
articles.title: EU delays approval of Novavax's revised Covid jab - Financial Times
articles.description: US biotech has been struggling to overcome fall in demand for coronavirus jabs
articles.content:
EU regulators have delayed a decision to approve Novavaxs variant-tailored Covid-19 vaccine, in a setback for the US-listed biotech which is battling a slump in demand for coronavirus jabs.
